snippet: With signature bombast and zeal, Vincent A. Cianci Jr. has exerted outsize influence as candidates scrambled to avoid indirectly helping him by splitting the vote.
abstract: Vincent A Cianci Jr, infamous former mayor of Providence, RI, whose two administrations were both cut short by felony convictions, is running again for the office, campaigning as an independent; Cianci will not be on primary ballot, but he has exerted outsize influence on field, which has shrunk as candidates scramble to avoid indirectly helping him by splitting vote.
lead_paragraph: With signature bombast and zeal, Vincent A. Cianci Jr. has exerted outsize influence as candidates scrambled to avoid indirectly helping him by splitting the vote.

headline.main: Candidate Not on Providence Primary Ballot Stirs Mayoral Field
headline.print_headline: Candidate Not on Providence Primary Ballot Stirs Mayoral Field
